name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】KIARA & FRIENDS： H!P Cover Song Spring Concert #HPmeetsHoloEN [jjLLByDa3Xc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: MC segment featuring Kiara and the unit JUSTICE (Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame, Gigi Murin, Cecilia Immergreen, Raora Panthera). They introduce themselves and share handwritten messages for Kiara.
Kiara transitions to the next part of the concert as the stage changes to night.
Performance of the song 'Rival' by Hololive English members.

subtitles.original: I am Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame!
subtitles.english: I am Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame!

subtitles.original: Gigi Murin!
subtitles.english: Gigi Murin!

subtitles.original: Cecilia Immergreen!
subtitles.english: Cecilia Immergreen!

subtitles.original: Raora Panthera! Woo!
subtitles.english: Raora Panthera! Woo!

subtitles.original: And we are... JUSTICE!
subtitles.english: And we are... JUSTICE!

subtitles.original: JUSTICE!
subtitles.english: JUSTICE!

subtitles.original: JUSTICE!
subtitles.english: JUSTICE!

subtitles.original: Just like that!
subtitles.english: Just like that!

subtitles.original: JUSTICE!
subtitles.english: JUSTICE!

subtitles.original: GET THAT!
subtitles.english: GET THAT!

subtitles.original: JUSTICE!
subtitles.english: JUSTICE!

subtitles.original: Okay, JUSTICE! You girls will have to work a little bit more on your sync...
subtitles.english: Okay, JUSTICE! You girls will have to work a little bit more on your sync...

subtitles.original: ...but besides that, beautiful!
subtitles.english: ...but besides that, beautiful!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Yeah, man!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Yeah, man!

subtitles.original: So, we just had a beautiful song, a little bit of a performance together.
subtitles.english: So, we just had a beautiful song, a little bit of a performance together.

subtitles.original: It was like your first time in, like, 3D cardboard.
subtitles.english: It was like your first time in, like, 3D cardboard.

subtitles.original: Yeah! I'm so happy to be 2D!
subtitles.english: Yeah! I'm so happy to be 2D!

subtitles.original: I think our dancing was a bit flat.
subtitles.english: I think our dancing was a bit flat.

subtitles.original: It was beautiful! Sometimes you gotta get on the floor, you already have that down.
subtitles.english: It was beautiful! Sometimes you gotta get on the floor, you already have that down.

subtitles.original: So, we sang "Seishun Collection" from Morning Musume.
subtitles.english: So, we sang "Seishun Collection" from Morning Musume.

subtitles.original: And as you noticed in the beginning of the song, we had some messages lying there...
subtitles.english: And as you noticed in the beginning of the song, we had some messages lying there...

subtitles.original: ...that were written by these cutie-patooties.
subtitles.english: ...that were written by these cutie-patooties.

subtitles.original: So let's have a little bit of a look at those messages, shall we?
subtitles.english: So let's have a little bit of a look at those messages, shall we?

subtitles.original: I'm gonna get mine.
subtitles.english: I'm gonna get mine.

subtitles.original: Yay! Let's look! Let's look!
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's look! Let's look!

subtitles.original: Okay, so I'll start with introducing my message.
subtitles.english: Okay, so I'll start with introducing my message.

subtitles.original: Love, unconditionally. Thanks for coming! by Wawa
subtitles.english: Love, unconditionally. Thanks for coming! by Wawa

subtitles.original: Mine's a bit more generic or something, I don't know, this is not really towards anybody.
subtitles.english: Mine's a bit more generic or something, I don't know, this is not really towards anybody.

subtitles.original: But it says: "Love, unconditionally. Thanks for coming!"
subtitles.english: But it says: "Love, unconditionally. Thanks for coming!"

subtitles.original: ...By Wawa." Yay!
subtitles.english: ...By Wawa." Yay!

subtitles.original: Yay! Kawaii!
subtitles.english: Yay! Kawaii!

subtitles.original: And now, please, in your usual order, tell me about your message and what you wrote on it.
subtitles.english: And now, please, in your usual order, tell me about your message and what you wrote on it.

subtitles.original: Oh, I wrote "Love You!" to Kiwawa, and then these little flowers around it...
subtitles.english: Oh, I wrote "Love You!" to Kiwawa, and then these little flowers around it...

subtitles.original: Love You! -Liz
subtitles.english: Love You! -Liz

subtitles.original: ...to represent us as JUSTICE.
subtitles.english: ...to represent us as JUSTICE.

subtitles.original: Because, yeah, we love everyone. Yay! Wow!
subtitles.english: Because, yeah, we love everyone. Yay! Wow!

subtitles.original: Aww, so cute!
subtitles.english: Aww, so cute!

subtitles.original: I'm so happy we could be part of your song. Thank you.
subtitles.english: I'm so happy we could be part of your song. Thank you.

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: All right, what else have we got? Who's next?
subtitles.english: All right, what else have we got? Who's next?

subtitles.original: Mine says "OTSUKARE KIWAWA!!" because you worked so hard.
subtitles.english: Mine says "OTSUKARE KIWAWA!!" because you worked so hard.

subtitles.original: LOVE OTSUKARE KIWAWA!! I love you too
subtitles.english: LOVE OTSUKARE KIWAWA!! I love you too

subtitles.original: And I'm happy to be here. And L-O-V-E! I love you too!
subtitles.english: And I'm happy to be here. And L-O-V-E! I love you too!

subtitles.original: Cute! And who else? What else do we have?
subtitles.english: Cute! And who else? What else do we have?

subtitles.original: I wrote mine in German! I wrote "Vielen Dank! Kiara-Senpai!"
subtitles.english: I wrote mine in German! I wrote "Vielen Dank! Kiara-Senpai!"

subtitles.original: Vielen Dank! Kiara-Senpai! Hab dich lieb! Cecilia
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! Kiara-Senpai! Love you! Cecilia

subtitles.original: "Hab dich lieb!"
subtitles.english: "Love you!"

subtitles.original: Yay! And last but not least?
subtitles.english: Yay! And last but not least?

subtitles.original: I wrote mine in Italian for you! "Ti amo Kiara!"
subtitles.english: I wrote mine in Italian for you! "I love you, Kiara!"

subtitles.original: TI AMO KIARA!! Thank you for being an amazing SENPAI!! By RAORA PANTHERA
subtitles.english: I LOVE YOU KIARA!! Thank you for being an amazing SENPAI!! By RAORA PANTHERA

subtitles.original: Thank you for being an amazing Senpai!
subtitles.english: Thank you for being an amazing Senpai!

subtitles.original: Thank you! I'm so happy that we have, you know, I took your first time. Yay!
subtitles.english: Thank you! I'm so happy that we have, you know, I took your first time. Yay!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Thank you for taking my first time.
subtitles.english: Thank you for taking my first time.

subtitles.original: Yeah, all on stream. It was so much fun.
subtitles.english: Yeah, all on stream. It was so much fun.

subtitles.original: And with that, unfortunately, I have to already send you out because we got some stuff to do.
subtitles.english: And with that, unfortunately, I have to already send you out because we got some stuff to do.

subtitles.original: What?
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: Thank you JUSTICE so much for coming!
subtitles.english: Thank you JUSTICE so much for coming!

subtitles.original: No problem! Thank you Kiara! Next time in 3D! Bye bye!
subtitles.english: No problem! Thank you Kiara! Next time in 3D! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: Bye bye! Bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye! Bye!

subtitles.original: Oh! It's turning night. How romantic!
subtitles.english: Oh! It's turning night. How romantic!

subtitles.original: Well, we are in the home stretch now, so stay with me until the very end!
subtitles.english: Well, we are in the home stretch now, so stay with me until the very end!

subtitles.original: Go-Go Fight!
subtitles.english: Go-Go Fight!

subtitles.original: Go-Go Fight!
subtitles.english: Go-Go Fight!

subtitles.original: 一つ 二つ 大きく回せ
subtitles.english: One, two, rotate it big

subtitles.original: 三つ 四つ さあ行こう！
subtitles.english: Three, four, let's go!

subtitles.original: Go-Go Fight!
subtitles.english: Go-Go Fight!

subtitles.original: La la la la la la 愛の歌声が
subtitles.english: La la la la la la, the singing voices of love

subtitles.original: 聞こえてくるから
subtitles.english: Are coming to be heard

subtitles.original: 恋するだけなら なんとかなるけど
subtitles.english: If it's just falling in love, I can manage somehow, but...

subtitles.original: 愛するとなるとね
subtitles.english: ...when it comes to loving...

subtitles.original: 勇気も必要 それより相手よね
subtitles.english: ...courage is also necessary. More than that, a partner!

subtitles.original: いない ない？
subtitles.english: None? None?

subtitles.original: 気づけば夏だし そのうち冬だし
subtitles.english: Before I know it, it's summer, and soon it'll be winter

subtitles.original: なんだか切ないな
subtitles.english: It's somehow painful

subtitles.original: 結局姉貴と毎日バイキング
subtitles.english: In the end, it's every day at the buffet with my big sister

subtitles.original: Go-Go Fight!
subtitles.english: Go-Go Fight!

subtitles.original: 友達みんな彼といちゃいちゃ
subtitles.english: All my friends are flirting with their boyfriends

subtitles.original: くっついたり別れたり
subtitles.english: Sticking together and breaking up

subtitles.original: 軽くね？
subtitles.english: A bit light, right?

subtitles.original: 本当の恋愛はそんな簡単じゃん...
subtitles.english: True love isn't that easy...
